Name: Dashpong
About the game: Dashpong is a unique and fast-paced local multiplayer game. High energy and sometimes chaotic, it's the perfect arcade game to play with your friends! You move freely on the map and create physics based paddles when dashing. Push the ball into your opponents' goal by throwing your paddles across the map! Dashpong is easy to pickup but hard to master, it’s the perfect game to have fun with your friend and challenge them. Play the classic mode , with just you and the paddles or the arcade mode with tons of special modes bending the rules to renew your experience and challenge your skills: Multiple balls Changing gravity Time rewind Destructible environment Power ups  (speed, force, longer dash, etc...) And 20+ more ! DEFEND YOUR GOALS Create paddles at the last moment to protect your goal! USE THE ENVIRONMENT Use the environment to your advantage! CREATE PADDLES Dashing to create paddle can save you, but be careful, it can be turned against you! UP TO 4 PLAYERS Do all of the above up to 4 players locally. More people, more chaos, more fun! MANY MAPS Small goals, weird angles, obstacles, all kinds of maps! MANY SPECIAL MODES Rewind, portals, gravity wells, invisible paddles, and many, many more! 10+ maps 1V1 and 2V2 mode 25+ Special modes with power ups, crazy environments and twisted rules Team color selection: choose the color that suits your team the best Custom mode: You control everything: maps, player size, strength, number of paddles and balls, etc.. Try out the demo now! /
